title: Portable version
body: ive heard that you can make apps portable using some apps, is there anyway i can do that with league and how do i get permission to do so

replies.body: I don't mean like a phone. I want to put it on a USB so i can play it at friends houses and take it to other places. Obviously i'll need access to a pc but i dont want to have to install league on every device i go on.

I think you are talking about making League of Legends portable,  and I don't think Riot (not speaking on their behalf) will ever do this, just because the game would take up heaps of space and probably make your phone a brick (if you know what those are you are either old or around the age of 18).

There are some games out there that do make copy-cat versions of LoL, that can be played on a phone - I don't know any of them, I just get bombed by heaps of ads when playing on my phone and usually I run into games like these.
